name: Gravity (itch) (BrokenOS)
description:
This is a small game made in under 72 Hours for the MashUp Game Jam 2!

It's a rather unconventional platformer where the playable area changes with gravity!

Just step on a gravity well and see what happens!

A truly epic story for the ages! 

The brave young cube in space tries to reach the goal because... well... it's the goal!

It's built entirely in the Gdevelop5 Physics Engine2.0 so if there are a few quirks that's probably why! 

(I.E. Sticky walls... player sometimes gets stuck on a smooth surface... etc...)

P.S. I know the exit button doesn't work when the game is embedded but I built it as a standalone app then exported it as HTML. I figured I could support more people that way!
